ministry.name: Internet Ministry
ministry.overview: Wonder who puts this site together? The internet ministry pulls together all of the most current technologies to outreach over the web.

long-description.heading: Want to help?
long-description.p: We need help from people who know or are willing to learn XML, XSL, Java, Java Servlets/JSP, database technologies, and HTML/Javascript.
We are also looking for anyone who knows how to perform basic computer operations, such as creating, editing, and copying files, for content management of this web site.
